Package com.github.games647.scoreboardstats.pvpstats

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Database
    This represents a handler for saving player stats.
    DatabaseConfiguration
    Configuration for the SQL database.
    PathReader
    This is workaround to a bug in Java 6. eBean 2.7.3 has a bug catching up the wrong exception while scanning through the ebean.properties.
    PlayerStats
    Represents the stats from a player.
    SignListener
    Replace some variables on signs with the player individual stats.
    StatsListener
    If enabled this class counts the kills.
    StatsLoader
    This class is used for loading the player stats.
    StatsSaver
    Saves the player stats to the database system.
    StatsVariables
    Replace the self tracking stats variables
